verses.verse: Thus the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H3619>me:<s%> behold, a basket of summer <S%H7019>fruit.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5986>"370,<s%> what do you <S%H7200>see?<s%>" I <S%H559>said,<s%> "A <S%H3619>basket<s%> of summer <S%H7019>fruit.<s%>" Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7093>me,<s%> "The end has <S%H935>come<s%> on my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> I will not <S%H3254>again<s%> pass by them any <S%H5674>more.<s%>

The <S%H7892>songs<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> will be <S%H3213>wailings<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%> "The dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> will be <S%H7227>many.<s%> In every <S%H4725>place<s%> they will throw them <S%H7993>out<s%> with <S%H2013>silence.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H7602>this,<s%> you who desire to swallow up the <S%H34>needy,<s%> and <S%H7673>cause<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7673>fail,<s%>

<S%H559>Saying,<s%> <S%H2320><s%> 'When will the new moon be <S%H5674>gone,<s%> that we may <S%H7666>sell<s%> <S%H7668>grain?<s%> And the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> that we may <S%H6605>market<s%> <S%H1250>wheat,<s%> making the <S%H374>ephah<s%> <S%H6994>small,<s%> and the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> <S%H1431>large,<s%> and dealing <S%H5791>falsely<s%> with <S%H3976>balances<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit;<s%>

that we may <S%H7069>buy<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> for <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> for a pair of <S%H5275>shoes,<s%> and <S%H7666>sell<s%> the <S%H4651>sweepings<s%> with the <S%H1250>wheat?<s%>'"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> "Surely I will <S%H5331>never<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> any of their <S%H4639>works.<s%>

<S%H776>Won't<s%> the land <S%H7264>tremble<s%> for <S%H56>this,<s%> and everyone mourn who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in <S%H5927>it?<s%> Yes, it will rise up wholly like the <S%H2975>River;<s%> and it will be <S%H1644>stirred<s%> up and <S%H8257>sink<s%> <S%H216>again,<s%> like the River of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> "that I will cause the <S%H8121>sun<s%> to go <S%H935>down<s%> at <S%H6672>noon,<s%> and I will <S%H2821>darken<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H216>clear<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

I will <S%H2015>turn<s%> your <S%H2282>feasts<s%> into <S%H60>mourning,<s%> and all your <S%H7892>songs<s%> into <S%H7015>lamentation;<s%> and I will <S%H5927>make<s%> you wear <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on all your <S%H4975>bodies,<s%> and <S%H7144>baldness<s%> on every <S%H7218>head.<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> it like the <S%H60>mourning<s%> for an <S%H3173>only<s%> <S%H319>son,<s%> and its end like a <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3117>Behold,<s%> the days <S%H935>come,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> "that I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> not a <S%H7458>famine<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> nor a <S%H6772>thirst<s%> for <S%H4325>water,<s%> but of <S%H8085>hearing<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They will <S%H5128>wander<s%> from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and from the <S%H6828>north<s%> even to the <S%H4217>east;<s%> they will run back and <S%H7751>forth<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and will not find <S%H4672>it.<s%>
In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%> and the young <S%H970>men<s%> will <S%H5968>faint<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>

Those who <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H819>sin<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H430><s%> 'As your god, <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H2416>lives;<s%>' <S%H1870>and,<s%> 'As the way of <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> <S%H2416>lives;<s%>' they will <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and never rise up <S%H6965>again.<s%>"
